Want to help build out a #phoenix area SaaS company's next generation platform?
I'm currently working on building out "Platform Development" teams with several cutting edge #phx companies.
If you're interested in creating the backbone of these highly-scalable (containerized) and modern environments then I've got needs for Java, Python, and Go (golang) talent all around the Valley.
Coder Camps is looking for a Software Engineer to add to the team!!! If you or someone else you know is interested, please reach out to me.
As a Software Engineer at Coder Camps, you will:
**Work together with a team of top level engineers using industry best practices in a .NET environment
**Develop both server and client-side components for modern, media-rich web applications
**Design and develop core extensions to an innovative web application framework
**Be a highly motivated “self-starter” who is passionate about software development
Do you have the right background?
**Experience working with real-time and asynchronous web applications
**Able to use modern web development tools and languages (ES6, webpack, npm etc.)
**Experience building multi-platform, responsive and scalable UIs
My favorite time of year in sports is free agency.
The money is always ridiculous, the competition for talent is fierce, and it is fun to speculate where that top athlete will end up.
But there is always an underlying theme that factors into everyone's decision:
"Which team will help me become a legend?"
I don't understand why so many of us don't think this way.  Why are we not all trying to be "legendary" at what we do?  Don't we owe it to ourselves, to our families, to be the best we can be?

Mortgage Professionals, as we enter the "free agency" period of our industry, take a minute and reflect on your current situation today.  Do you have the support around you to become great at what you do?   Are you achieving your full potential, or are you simply content and unwilling to change?

As Dan Hanson, our Chief Retail Production Officer, put it in the quote below, "If you want to know how good you are.  You should come here.  Because if you succeed here, you'll be the best in the industry."
Join the best, be the best.  If you're ready to talk about a move to loanDepot, drop me a line, cbartley@loandepot.com
Mike Mathis  Derrick Novakowski  Jim Weir  Shawna Oakley  Buck Kilman  Rae Saldana  Tony Psaromatis  Hans Plum

Sr. Software Engineer in Downtown Seattle - 150k + great benefits.  I have a global eCommerce Client in Seattle looking for a Sr. Engineer with strong Java/Spring experience for an FTE role.  Please contact me at brian@techmarc.com.  Please - no 3rd parties.

We are currently recruiting for a Builder Loan Consultant supporting a Top 15 builder in the US.  This is an exciting role with a dynamic and innovative company that will allow to take your career to the next level.

loanDepot’s Retail Division, offers home purchase and refinance loans, personal loans and home equity products nationwide. Headquartered in Southern California, the company operates Direct, Retail and Wholesale business channels nationwide. Our goal is to be the lender of choice for consumers and the employer of choice by being a company that operates on sound principles of exceptional value, ethics and transparency. Licensed in all 50 states, loanDepot generates loan production from 12 business production centers, employs 5,400+ people including more than 1,700 licensed lending officers who hold more than 10,000 state licenses, and operates over 180+ lending stores nationwide. loanDepot NMLS #174457.  Why choose loanDepot? Here are a few reasons… • loanDepot is the 5th largest Retail mortgage lender in the country, funding over $90 billion since inception• One of the fastest growing lenders in the industry today with 70% average annual growth since 2010• National footprint, with over 180+ locations across the country and 400% market share growth annually• Competitive and sustainable compensation programs for both originators and operations employees• Most complete builder-support platform of any company, including Extended Rate Locks, internal Condo Department, Builder Express Program and Forward Commitments• Dedicated processing and underwriting teams for each branch office• loanDepot is an approved seller and servicer for Fannie Mae, Freddie Mac and Ginnie MaeloanDepot.com, LLC, 26642 Towne Centre Drive, Foothill Ranch, CA 92610. All rights reserved. NMLS #174457 (www.nmlsconsumeraccess.org). For more licensing information, please visit www.loanDepot.com/licensing. www.loandepot.com/privacypolicy

VincentBenjamin Group is a regional recruitment and consulting firm with an extensive network of premier companies and professionals across multiple practice areas, including: Accounting, Finance, Technology, and Human Resources.Our core business is to provide placement services on a permanent, interim or project basis for employers seeking quality talent while assisting candidates in identifying career and consulting opportunities.We cover all major industries and place professionals from staff to c-suite executive management positions. Our teams consist of experienced recruiting professionals with deep functional experience within the field they serve, allowing for informed and specialized service to our clients and candidates.

In 25 countries and 30 American states our goal is to create extraordinary guest and member experiences through personalized service, consistency, and uncompromising attention to detail. We want to exceed your expectations every time you're our guest.Responsible for effective recruiting practices in an effort to attract and retain top talent within the industry which ultimately enhances service standards, maximizes profitability, and raises overall satisfaction scores.

I have worked with Tami for several years at various recruiting firms, and she is undoubtedly the most personable, caring and supportive recruiter I have worked with.  She takes the time to understand exactly what you are looking for, and if you are not sure, she will help you to determine what would be the best fit for your experience and knowledge as well determining a suitable company culture for your lifestyle and personality.  She has the utmost integrity and is honest and objective with feedback.  I think most importantly, though, she is extremely encouraging and positive, yet realistic.  I truly enjoy working with Tami, and I know she has my best interest, as well as her clients’ best interests at heart.  Thank you for everything, Tami!  You are truly an amazing and talented recruiter, and I appreciate all you have done for me.
